Studio Stirling
SLING chairs: FACES OF AFRICA

PRODUCT DATA:
Manufacturer: Studio Stirling (Pty) Ltd.
Designers: Joanina and David Pastoll
Illustrator: Tsepo Makate
Year of launch: 2017

Size: 1000 x 1000 x 350 mm / 39 x 39 x 14 in

Stripped away from all excess, this hanging chair has a circular powder coated frame with a single sheet of leather hanging loose within it, to create a sleek, sexy, and oh so comfortable experience. This chair’s clean lines and its “lightness” makes it a perfect fit for any space.

This functional art piece, ideal for use as a accent piece was designed by Joanina and David Pastoll in collaboration with Tsepo Makate - South African artist and illustrator – who did the beautiful illustrations. Have a look at the range of drawings available to order.

The Leather is hand dyed and the illustration is then carved – also by hand into the leather. Unique variances will be found in each one.

Pairing the purity of simple tubular steel with the sensual warmth of natural hide - it has a sleek look and an air of beauty and functional elegance. Form-fitting comfort perfect both for indoor and covered outdoor spaces.

The SLING CHAIR disassembles and splits in half for flat packing – great for packing and freight.
